participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, always looking for ways to brighten the day.
participant_1.background: I usually listen to music to cheer myself up. I like to plant flowers in my gardens. I will share my love for hamburgers with others through my let's plays. I sometimes play with my guns in a dangerous way. I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, loves to explore new hobbies and express himself through music.
participant_2.background: I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea. I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it. I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job! I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art. I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hi there! What's good?
Not much, just got home from work. I'm a gummy worm maker, and it's been a long day!
That's awesome! I love gummy worms. You must have a very sweet tooth!
Yes, I do! I love sweets, and I love to make them. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to play video games, and I love to garden. I also like to listen to music and watch movies.
That's cool! I like to watch movies too. I also like to run and drink chai tea.
I like chai tea too! It's so delicious.
I know, right? It's the perfect drink for a chilly day.
What are some of your favorite movies?
I like a lot of different movies, but some of my favorites are The Lord of the Rings trilogy, Star Wars, and The Matrix.
Those are all great movies! I love them too.
Me too! They're so good!
What are some of your favorite video games?
I like a lot of different video games, but some of my favorites are the Assassin's Creed series, the Call of Duty series, and the Grand Theft Auto series.
Those are all great games! I love them too.
Me too! They're so fun!
What are some of your favorite rock songs?
I like a lot of different rock songs, but some of my favorites are Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen, Stairway to Heaven by Led Zeppelin, and Smells Like Teen Spirit by Nirvana.
Those are all great songs! I love them too.
Me too! They're so good!
What are some of your favorite rock bands?
I like a lot of different rock bands, but some of my favorites are Queen, Led Zeppelin, Nirvana, Metallica, The Beatles, and Guns N' Roses.
Those are all great bands! I love them too.
Me too! They're so good!
I think we have a lot in common!
I think so too!
We should be friends!
I'd love to be friends!
Great! I'm going to add you on Facebook.
Awesome! I'll add you back!
Great! I can't wait to get to know you better!
Me too!
